details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.3 Artifacts - Structure element type
details.description: Each structure element dictionary in the structure hierarchy shall have a Type entry with the name value of StructElem

rule.description: Each structure element dictionary in the structure hierarchy shall have a Type entry with the name value of StructElem

error.message: Missing or invalid Type entry in the structure element dictionary
